title: Can't connect to chat server / Can't queue
body:
Picture of my client: http://prntscr.com/cbezqv

If anyone has any ideas I'd really appreciate it. Thank you for your help. I will edit and add more as I try onto the list until I get the solution.

What I have tried so far:
- Disabling Norton and launching.
- Launch as admin.
- Click le button.

replies.body:
If you're still having this issue, it's likely to be something with your local network setup that's preventing your client from reaching to PvP.net chat servers. Our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a great place to start in resolving this.

Please let me know the results of those steps.
Tried everything on there I could and nothing changed.

In that case, there may be an issue along your route to the server, in which case we'll need to do some thorough investigation. If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll get a tech specialist with you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I think its Riots fault, maybe they are maintaining the Servers.
